description: This table shows the coefficients of combinatorial formulas needed for generating the sequential sums of p-th powers of binomial coefficients C(n,4). The p-th row (p>=1) contains a(i,p) for i=1 to 4*p-3, where a(i,p) satisfies Sum_{i=1..n} C(i+3,4)^p = 5 * C(n+4,5) * Sum_{i=1..4*p-3} a(i,p) * C(n-1,i-1)/(i+4).
